attributes.action: ban Benjamin Christopher Yeates from all future house parties at the Ackroyd house.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2 Parties - 2 Passouts. Nuff Said.

Party 1 - passed out on sofa with hand up a 17 year olds shirt.

Party 2 - passed out on same sofa and was sick on the throw. 17 year old present, but no wandering hands on this occasion. Also had head dunked into a sink.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
